projects.title: Bank App - Spring Cloud Microservices
projects.description: Full-stack banking application built with Spring Cloud microservices architecture, demonstrating enterprise-level design patterns and scalable cloud-native development.
projects.longDescription: Practice application demonstrating full-stack development skills with microservices

projects.title: Data Pipeline with dbt using Airflow on GCP
projects.description: End-to-end data pipeline leveraging dbt for data transformations, Apache Airflow for orchestration, deployed on Google Cloud Platform for scalable data processing.
projects.longDescription: Modern data pipeline demonstrating clean code principles and cloud data engineering

projects.title: Real-Time Fraud Detection
projects.description: Real-time fraud detection system using industry best practices for identifying and preventing fraudulent transactions with machine learning algorithms.
projects.longDescription: Personal development project using industry best practices for fraud detection

projects.title: Data Science IPython Notebooks
projects.description: Comprehensive collection of Jupyter notebooks covering data science concepts, machine learning algorithms, and analytical techniques for continuous learning.
projects.longDescription: Interactive application built for continuous learning in data science

projects.title: SecPay
projects.description: Secure payment processing application implementing robust security measures and best practices for handling financial transactions safely.
projects.longDescription: Secure payment system with focus on security and reliability

projects.title: Data Recovery - ext3
projects.description: Low-level data recovery tool for ext3 file systems, demonstrating deep understanding of file system internals and system programming in C.
projects.longDescription: Data recovery utility for ext3 file systems
